item.title: How Wearable Tech Could Become ‘Big Brother’ in the Workplace
item.description: Monitoring people’s data from popular fitness gadgets can easily cross many privacy and ethical boundaries, risking a backlash from your workforce.

item.title: These Channels Are Blocked During the Disney-YouTube TV Fight
item.description: Streaming viewers are caught in the middle of a contract battle that will feel very familiar to anyone who remembers linear TV.

item.title: How AI Training Can Lead to Productivity Gains
item.description: Workplaces that tell employees to use AI, and follow through with training and support get twice as much out of these tools.

item.title: Zillow Made a Real-Estate App for ChatGPT in 6 Weeks. Here’s How
item.description: Zillow is the first real-estate app on ChatGPT, giving the company a new way to reach customers.

item.title: 5 Takeaways for Business Owners from Tuesday’s Blue Wave Election Results
item.description: Elections in New York City, New Jersey, Virginia, and California offered some valuable lessons for entrepreneurs.
